name: NSURLDownloadDelegate
desc: A protocol that URL download delegates implement to interact with a URL download request.

items.name: func download(NSURLDownload, canAuthenticateAgainstProtectionSpace: URLProtectionSpace) -> Bool
items.desc: Sent to determine whether the delegate is able to respond to a protection spaceâ€™s form of authentication.

items.name: func download(NSURLDownload, didCancel: URLAuthenticationChallenge)
items.desc: Sent if an authentication challenge is canceled due to the protocol implementation encountering an error.

items.name: func download(NSURLDownload, didReceive: URLAuthenticationChallenge)
items.desc: Sent when the URL download must authenticate a challenge in order to download the request.

items.name: func downloadShouldUseCredentialStorage(NSURLDownload) -> Bool
items.desc: Sent to determine whether the URL loader should consult the credential storage to authenticate the download.

items.name: func download(NSURLDownload, decideDestinationWithSuggestedFilename: String)
items.desc: The delegate receives this message when download has determined a suggested filename for the downloaded file.

items.name: func downloadDidBegin(NSURLDownload)
items.desc: Sent immediately after a download object begins a download.

items.name: func download(NSURLDownload, didCreateDestination: String)
items.desc: Sent when the destination file is created.

items.name: func download(NSURLDownload, didReceive: URLResponse)
items.desc: Sent when a download object has received sufficient load data to construct the NSURLResponse object for the download.

items.name: func download(NSURLDownload, didReceiveDataOfLength: Int)
items.desc: Sent as a download object receives data incrementally.

items.name: func download(NSURLDownload, shouldDecodeSourceDataOfMIMEType: String) -> Bool
items.desc: Sent when a download object determines that the downloaded file is encoded to inquire whether the file should be automatically decoded.

items.name: func download(NSURLDownload, willResumeWith: URLResponse, fromByte: Int64)
items.desc: Sent when a download object has received a response from the server after attempting to resume a download.

items.name: func download(NSURLDownload, willSend: URLRequest, redirectResponse: URLResponse?) -> URLRequest?
items.desc: Sent when the download object determines that it must change URLs in order to continue loading a request.

items.name: func download(NSURLDownload, didFailWithError: Error)
items.desc: Sent if the download fails or if an I/O error occurs when the file is written to disk.

items.name: func downloadDidFinish(NSURLDownload)
items.desc: Sent when a download object has completed downloading successfully and has written its results to disk.
